title: Pilot
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Pilot>>
<<Portrait|Pilot_neutral>>
Hello, Captain.
<</Textbox>>

[[Keep up the good work.|Pilot.Alright]]

[[Have you seen this $CLUE before?|Pilot.Clue]]

title: Pilot.Alright
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Captain>>
Keep up the good work.
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Pilot>>
<<Portrait|Pilot_neutral>>
Alright.
<</Textbox>>

//End conversation

title: Pilot.Clue
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Captain>>
Have you seen this $CLUE before?
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Pilot>>
<<Portrait|Pilot_neutral>>
That's mine! Where did you get that?
<</Textbox>>

[[I found it at $CRIMESCENE.|Pilot.Reply]]

[[Why are you so loud?|Pilot.Retort]]

title: Pilot.Reply
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Captain>>
I found it in $CRIMESCENE. Any idea why?
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Pilot>>
<<Portrait|Pilot_neutral>>
$CRIMESCENE? Why was it there? I usually keep it in $LOCATION. Were you moving my stuff?
<</Textbox>>

[[Someone else did.|Pilot.KeyDialogue]]

[[Why would I?|Pilot.Retort1]]

title: Pilot.Retort
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Captain>>
Why are you so loud?
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Pilot>>
<<Portrait|Pilot_mad>>
Because I'm the only one doing anything on this ship!
<</Textbox>>

<<set $Pilotloyalty to $Pilotloyalty - 1>>

//End conversation

title: Pilot.KeyDialogue
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Captain>>
No, but someone was. I need to find them before anything else happens.
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Pilot>>
<<Portrait|Pilot_neutral>>
Be sure to put that back when you're done with it.
<</Textbox>>

//Unlock Clue Key Dialogue

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Captain>>
Thanks. Keep up the good work.
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Pilot>>
<<Portrait|Pilot_neutral>>
Alright.
<</Textbox>>

title: Pilot.Retort1
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Captain>>
Why would I move your stuff?
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Pilot>>
<<Portrait|Pilot_mad>>
Because I'm the only one doing anything on this ship!
<</Textbox>>

<<set $Pilotloyalty to $Pilotloyalty - 1>>

//End conversation
